oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Chattanooga Public Schools statement on Chattanooga High School, circa 1963-1965
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Chattanooga Public Schools (Chattanooga, Tennessee)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Statement prepared by the school board of Chattanooga, Tennessee about the new Chattanooga High School facility. During the desegregation process, Chattanooga High School was moved to a new building, and the old CHS building became the all-black Riverside High School.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Education -- Tennessee -- Chattanooga
Chattanooga Public Schools (Chattanooga, Tennessee)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Chattanooga Board of Education meeting agendas, reports, and correspondence, 1969
Chattanooga Board of Education records and correspondence, 1965-1969
